p.k: All Wet No one believes Ben when he insists that one of the other patrons waiting on line at the World of Wet Water Park is the nefarious Frightwig disguised as a common girl so Ben must prove his case while protecting parkgoers from her master plan: to destroy t...
p.d: While on a seemingly endless summer vacation with his Grandpa Max and Cousin Gwen, Ben Tennyson discovers an alien watch: the Omnitrix. This device gives Ben the ability to transform into any one of ten spectacular and powerful aliens! Ben, Gwen and Max travel the country in their motor home affectionately known as the Rust Bucket seeing the sights, stumbling into adventures and beating down would-be villains while generally having a blast!
